review: Best free game I've ever played.
REALLY fun with mates, but only if you've got a controller.7/10 because although it IS fun, it lacks the content to keep you entertained for many hours of gameplay.
'HUAH, HUAH. HUAH HUAH HUAH. HUAH... HUAH. HUAH, HUAH HUAH HUAH HUAH. HUAH HU- AGHH!'10/10, it's free.
If you enjoy gore, this game is for you.
A very rewarding game, if you know how to use teamwork. Unlike any other FPS out there.
